attributes.action: Allow all travellers to use Lateral Flow Test after their arrival to the UK
attributes.additional_details: The move is not backed by any scientific reason and therefore is clearly only discriminatory and coercive towards vaccination. If lateral flow tests are valid and effective in detecting potential spreaders and positive results should be trusted, that's true regardless of the vaccination status of the individual. Natural immunity in the UK unfortunately is treated as not having immunity, but several studies are confirming the opposite. https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2021.08.24.21262415v1
attributes.background: From the 24/10/2021, the Government allowed only fully vaccinated travellers to use lateral flow tests on or before day 2 of their arrival to the UK. All travellers regardless of their vaccination status should be allowed to use this cheaper testing method. https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-58899612

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599247
